org.qi4j.functional

Class ForEach<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.qi4j.functional.ForEach<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Iterable<T>

    public final class ForEach<T>
extends Object
implements Iterable<T>
    When using Iterables with map() and filter() the code often reads "in reverse", with the first item last in the code. Example: Iterables.map(function,Iterables.filter(specification, iterable))

    This ForEach class reverses that order and makes the code more readable, and allows easy application of visitors on iterables.

    Example: forEach(iterable).filter(specification).map(function).visit(visitor)
